paper_abstract: We introduce the bipolar complemented de Morgan Brouwer-Zadeh distributive lattice in order to give an algebraic model the to Dominance-based Rough Set Approach. We present also the concept of bipolar approximation space and we show how it can be induced from a bipolar quasi Brouwer-Zadeh lattice.
paper_title: The Bipolar Complemented de Morgan Brouwer-Zadeh Distributive Lattice as an Algebraic Structure for the Dominance-based Rough Set Approach
